alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 8:30AM CDT until November 02 at 3:34PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur along the right bank to agricultural fields and the cattle industry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 30.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 39.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
